title: Hopton 10k
description: A mixed terrian 10km race, perfect for the adventurous road runner

content.title: The idea
content.description: If you've mostly done road racing before but fancy getting your trainers a little bit dirty, then this is the event for you.

content.title: Where is it?
content.description: Hopton 10k is a new race taking in the lovely rolling hills around Hopton, Mirfield, in the Calder Valley near Huddersfield.

content.title: The Course
content.description: Fairly hilly and mixed terrain. Taking place on quiet roads, bridleways and footpaths with roughly 40% road, 40% farm track and 20% footpath.
